short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Map your smart phone photos to share with your friends using Google Maps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Photo Mapper is a simple application that helps you share photos with friends by displaying them on Google Map. 

After uploading your images individually or in batches you can view them on a Google Map and share the link with your friends.
